content: single_crochet in each of next 3 st decrease across next half_double_crochet and double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in each of next 4 double_crochet chain 2 skip slip_stitch half_double_crochet slip_stitch x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 68 single_crochet 16 decrease 4 chain- 2 round 14 starting with yarn d in any corner chain-2 3 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet 3 double_crochet skip 2 st slip_stitch in next st skip st 5 double_crochet in decrease skip st slip_stitch skip st 5 half_double_crochet in next st x 2 skip st slip_stitch skip st 5 double_crochet in decrease skip st slip_stitch skip 2 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 40 half_double_crochet 64 double_crochet 12 treble_crochet 20 slip_stitch round 15 in this round the legs of the starfish continue to be tacked down as in round 11 i have not specified the exact position as the legs curve naturally and slightly differently depending which version you chose and your gauge the aim is to produce a life like posture if your legs are very curved you may need to tack the side of a leg or even tack one leg in more than one place play it by ear all stitches are worked blo starting with yarn c in the middle treble_crochet of a corner single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 3 st decrease across next 2 double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in each of next 3 st decrease across next double_crochet and half_double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in next 3 st decrease across next 2 half_double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in each of next 3 st sc2 decrease across next half_double_crochet and double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in each of next 3 st decrease across next 2 double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in each of next 3 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 80 single_crochet 20 decrease 4 half_double_crochet round 16 starting with yarn d in an decrease after a corner 5 double_crochet in decrease skip st slip_stitch skip st x 5 skip st 5 double_crochet in next st skip st 5 double_crochet in next st skip st slip_stitch skip st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 35 double_crochet 6 slip_stitch/side round 17 you could tack down the tips of the legs on this round if you like i prefer to see them curl a little in a life like way blo all stitches except the corner dcs starting with yarn c in any corner between groups of 5 dcs 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space skip st half_double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet decrease across next 2 double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between x 6 half_double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet skip st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off serpent star copyright lettice rose 2024 16 double_crochet 56 half_double_crochet 24 decrease 28 single_crochet 4 chain-2 round 18 starting with yarn b in any corner chain-2 and using a standing stitch 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet
